page.title: 07THE MEDIA IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: THE MAIN SOURCE OF INFORMATION AND ENTERTAINMENT IN MY HOUSE IS THE {TELEVISION}AND WE WATCH A LOT OF PROGRAMMES WHICH ARE BOTH INSTRUCTIVE AND RELAXING. {THE RADIO}IS ALSO A MEDIUM WHICH PROVIDES US WITH ENTERTAINMENT AND INFORMATION.I DO NOT LISTEN TO IT VERY OFTEN BUT MY MUM,DAD AND FOUR BROTHERS LISTEN OCCASIONALLY. THE LOCAL RADIO STATIONS ARE{RADIO TEES}AND{RADIO {CLEVELAND. WE GET A{NEWSLETTER}MONTHLY.IT TELLS US ABOUT GARDEN FETES AND CHURCH SERVICES AND ALSO HAPPENINGS LIKE PETROL THIEVING,HOUSE BREAK-INS AND OTHER{LOCAL NEWS}LIKE DEATHS,BIRTHS AND MARRIAGES.THE NEWSLETTER IS PREPARED BY THE{VICAR. OUR{LOCAL SHOP}IS ALSO A SOURCE OF LOCAL GOSSIP.THIS NEWS IS RAPIDLY SPREAD THROUGH THE VILLAGE.
